question: When I breathe in, all is normal...when I breathe out, I exhale to where breath stops..then a second short breath comes out invountarily... then I begin my next breath...  It seems to happen more often when I lie down or perhaps  I pay more attention then...I am a diabetic..could this have anything to do with diabetes?  It happens continuously for long periods of time.This discussion is related to/posts/show/296668.
title: ABNORMAL BREATHING
